items.name: Knog Expose Smart Bluetooth LED Light (Black) for Apple iPhone 4S, 5 Series & 6 with Stylus Pen + (3) Cleaning Cloths
items.longDescription: Knog Expose Smart Bluetooth <br> LED Light (Black) for Apple iPhone<br> 4S, 5 Series + 6 <br>Total control over your smartphone flash. <br><br>Whether its photos or videos, we all want them to be near perfect, and this nudges us ever closer. The <b>Knog Expose Smart Bluetooth LED Light</b> is bright in more ways than one, <b>seamlessly working via Bluetooth with the Apple iPhone 4S, 5 Series + 6</b> through the (expose) app. The <b>custom app includes video and photo modes</b> flash, strobe and continuous settings adjustable brightness and more. <br><br>With a USB rechargeable, integrated LiPo battery, there is <b>over one hour of run-time</b>. Also included in the pack are <b>4 attachment clips</b> -- so you can use the light with or without an iPhone case. Plus, a <b>handy lanyard</b> so your light doesnt need to leave your side. <br><br><b>Key Features:</b><br> <b>But I have a light on my iPhone:</b><br> Sure you do, but were talking about memories here. The light needs to be right. Whether its photos or videos, we all want them to be near perfect, and this nudges us ever closer. <b>This apps got teeth:</b><br> The light is bright in more ways than one, seamlessly working via Bluetooth with the iPhone through the (expose) app. The custom app includes video and photo modes flash, strobe and continuous settings adjustable brightness and more. It also allows you to share your favorite clips and pics via your favorite social media platforms. <ul><li>Intuitive design allows you to do all the things you would expect from a video / photo app.</li><li>Preview your videos and share via your favorite social media platforms.</li><li>Brightness and white balance settings let you create the best illumination effects.</li></ul><b>The light can make the night:</b><br> Seeing is believing with this tiny light. The (expose) smart delivers around 6x the brightness of the built-in light. With 9 LEDS, pumping out up to 130 lumens, and a beam angle matching the iPhone, youll capture more of the night than you ever did before (for better or worse). <b>Battery and bits:</b><br> With a USB rechargeable, integrated LiPo battery, there is over one hour of run-time. Thats over 280 Instagram vids, over 700 Vines... you get the idea, more than enough for a night out (or two). Also included in the pack are 4 attachment clips -- so you can use the light with or without an iPhone case. Plus, a handy lanyard so your light doesnt need to leave your side. <b>Double trouble:</b><br> Beautifully engineered to complement the iPhones hallowed curves, (expose) smart also comes in black and white. After all, being geeky on the inside doesnt stop you being gorgeous on the outside. And at only 0.6 oz. (16g), and with a handy clip and lanyard included, youll be able to whip out your (expose) anytime of the night. Youll hardly know its there. Until you turn it on, that is.

items.name: Custom Photo Phone Cases (iPhone and Samsung Galaxy)
items.shortDescription: You always have your phone with you, so why not show it off every time you make a call! Choose from multiple designs and add your favorite photo to a phone case for a customized creation. Cases are made of durable materials to protects your phone.
items.longDescription: Cases are available for both iPhone and Samsung models:<ul><li>iPhone 4/4S</li><li>iPhone 5/5S</li><li>iPhone 6</li><li>iPod 5th Gen</li><li>Samsung Galaxy S3</li><li>Samsung Galaxy S4</li><li>Samsung Galaxy Note II</li></ul>
